entry.title: yanu102/doScript
entry.summary: This is a wrapper script for InDesign scripts.

entry.title: k0ekk0ek/firefox-branding
entry.summary:
Script that installs official Firefox branding for Iceweasel in Debian GNU/Linux

Package that ships official Firefox branding bits for Iceweasel in Debian GNU/Linux

  1. Place browser.jar and en-US.jar files in the root.
  2. Issue dpkg-buildpackage -b
  3. Remove .mozilla directory from your home folder
  4. Launch Firefox after doing a new login
